argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zringsubgval.m | |- .- = ( -g ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zsubrg | |- ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 3 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnfldsub | |- - = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-zring | |- ZZring = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 7 | 5, 6, 1 | #P_subgsub | |- ( ( ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ X e. ZZ /\ Y e. ZZ ) -> ( X - Y ) = ( X .- Y ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( X e. ZZ /\ Y e. ZZ ) -> ( X - Y ) = ( X .- Y ) ) |
